attributes.action: Scrap the unjust and humiliating gun law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: scrap the humiliating instant guilt gun law that makes a joke and a laughing stock of my country, it's officials, it's leaders and it's justice system, wastes our money and uses up valuable resources persecuting people. I do not want to be a citizen of a country that makes an ass of itself.

rejection.details: Please resubmit your petition giving more information about the gun law to which you refer. There are numerous laws governing the use of firearms in the UK.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
